data.eml:eml: Description of new chiactine-bearing sponges provides insights into the higher classification of Calcaronea (Porifera: Calcarea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alvizu, Adriana, Xavier, Joana R., Rapp, Hans Tore (2019): Description of new chiactine-bearing sponges provides insights into the higher classification of Calcaronea (Porifera: Calcarea). Zootaxa 4615 (2): 201-251, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4615.2.1
